question: Which {state_var} received the {stat_method_1} NCAP funding?
code:
def true_code():
    import pandas as pd
    main_data = pd.read_pickle("preprocessed/main_data.pkl")
    states_data = pd.read_pickle("preprocessed/states_data.pkl")
    ncap_funding_data = pd.read_pickle("preprocessed/ncap_funding_data.pkl")

    state_funding = ncap_funding_data.groupby('{state_code}')['Total fund released'].sum().reset_index()
    required_state = state_funding.sort_values('Total fund released').iloc[{method_1}]['{state_code}']
    print(required_state)

true_code()
